about_the_game:
Godwreath: Chapter 1 is a top-down nonlinear survival horror game set in a prison in the fictional Balkan nation of Tetrania. Discover what lurks within the shadows of this unique world, filled with unsettling locations and characters.

Features:

  • Classic survival horror exploration without many of the common tropes and pitfalls of the horror genre, such as boring puzzles and cheap jump scares.

  • Tense combat, with a unique system revolving around health and adrenaline stats that support each other. If you run out of health, you can miraculously survive off of any remaining adrenaline. If you run out of adrenaline, attacking instead drains your health (representing stress).

  • Core gameplay mechanic: you must return to your cell before the end of each night, adding more tension to every journey you take into the darkness.

  • An intricate narrative with complex characters and lore.

  • Three different possible endings.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence between fictional pixel art characters. There is also one reference of suicide, but it is not depicted.
